summary: Not for the faint of heart, this mod will give you the shivers no doubt.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that aims to make the intro sequence of Skyrim so damn spooky that you will jump every time you open Skyrim.
Check the Video tab to see what this mod is all about! [color=#ea9999]Warning: could cause nightmares.[/color]

[color=#ff0000][b]If you plan on installing manually, make sure to back-up any files you replace (Namely BGS_Logo found under \skyrim\data\video)

[/b][/color]
[i][u]I did not make the video used in the intro and i do not want it to look like i did. The original source is (according to knowyourmeme) a 3d modeling program developed by "microsoft kids". The author is not known.
[/u][/i]
author: RudeDude69
